explains: v. 闪烁，闪耀；（眼睛因高兴而）发亮，发光；（脚）轻快移动
n. 闪烁，闪耀；（眼睛的）闪亮，欣喜的神情

sentences.en: At night, lights twinkle in distant cabins across the valleys.
sentences.cn: 晚上，灯光在山谷对面远处的小木屋里闪烁。

sentences.en: Do you know why the stars twinkle so merrily?
sentences.cn: 你知道为什么星星闪烁得那么快乐吗？

sentences.en: You shine your little light and twinkle all night.
sentences.cn: 你散发出你微弱的光，整夜闪烁。
